title: COULD THE MONEY BEING SPENT ON THE WALKING TRAIL ON INDEPENDENCE HAVE BEEN SPENT ON PAVING THIRD STREET DOWNTOWN OR USED FOR THE REPAIRS FOR THE WATER DEPT. ??   THIS IS SUCH A WASTE OF MONEY.  ARE WE SUPPOSED TO USE THE TRAIL TO WALK TO THE MALL AND USE THEIR RESTROOMS WHEN OUR SEWER SYSTEM FAILS AGAIN??  THANK YOU, ELSIE WILSON
text:
This is more of a comment than a question. You are welcome to submit
it as a letter to the editor.
